name: 施陽正
objective:
本課程主要目標為將數學方法應用在工程問題，課程內容有常微分方程，線性代數，向量微積分，及偏微分方程式等之簡介，訓練同學數學應用於工程計算及研究。內容包括數值方法，機率理論及數學機率等。
The main target of this course is to intoduce mathematical methods ot engineering applications; the course will cover areas in differential equations and vecto calculus. This course will also train students in applying mathematics to engineering calculations and research, such as unmerical methods and statistical methods.
schedule:
週次　　章節內容
1　　■ Reviews
■ Basic Concepts and Ideas
■ Geometrical Meaning of y’=f(x, y)
■ Separable Differential Eq
2　　■ Modeling: Separable Eq. 
■ Homogenous Linear Eq. of 2nd Order with Constant Coefficients
■ Euler-Cauchy Eq.
3　　■ Non-homogenous Equations
■ Solution by Undetermined Coefficients 
■ Higher Order Homogenous Linear Eq. with Constant Coefficients 
4　　■ Nonhomogeous Linear ODEs
■ Power Series Method
■ Theory of the Power Series Method
5　　■ Legendre’s Equation  
■ Legendre Polynomials Pn(x)
 6　　■第一次期中考(10/19-10/23)
7　　■ Laplace Transform
■ Transformations of Derivatives and Integrals Diff. Eq  
■ Unit Step Function
8　　■ Differentiation and Integration of Laplace Transforms
■ Convolution. Integral Eq.
■ Matrices, Vectors, Matrix Multiplication
9　　■ Linear Systems of Eqs.; Gauss Elimination
■ Rank of a Matrix; Linear Independence; Vector Space
■ Solutions of Linear System
10　　■ Determinants; Cramer’s Rule 
■ Inverse of a Matrix
11　　■ Eigenvalues, Eigenvectors
■ Some Applications of Eigenvalue Problems
■ Symmetric, Skew-Symmetric, and Orthogonal Matrices
12　　■ 第二次期中考(11/30-12/4)
13　　■ Curves; Tangents, Arc Length
■ Inner & Vector Product; Gradient of a Scalar Field; Directional Derivative
■ Divergence of a Vector Field; Curl of a Vector Field
14　　■ Line Integrals; Vector and Scalar Functions and Fields; Derivatives       
■ Double Integrals
■ Surface Integrals
15　　■ Triple Integrals; Divergence Theorem of Gauss
■ Fourier Series; Functions of Any Period p=2L   
16　　■ Even and Odd Functions
■ Fourier Integrals & Fourier Transform 
17　　■ Basic Concepts of PDE      
■ Separation of Variables 
■ Similarity Methods
18　　期末考
scorePolicy:
成績計算方式: 出席考核(減分)，兩次期中考與期末考;  
擇優兩次定為期中成績(50%)、期末成績(50%)
